org.gradoop.flink.model.api.epgm

Interface BaseGraphCollectionFactory<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge,LG extends BaseGraph<G,V,E,LG,GC>,GC extends BaseGraphCollection<G,V,E,LG,GC>>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - type of the graph head
    V - the vertex type
    E - the edge type
    LG - the type of the logical graph
    GC - the type of the graph collection that will be created with this factory
    All Superinterfaces:
    ElementFactoryProvider<G,V,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphCollectionFactory, TemporalGraphCollectionFactory

    public interface BaseGraphCollectionFactory<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge,LG extends BaseGraph<G,V,E,LG,GC>,GC extends BaseGraphCollection<G,V,E,LG,GC>>
extends ElementFactoryProvider<G,V,E>
    Responsible for creating instances of graph collections with type GC based on a specific GraphCollectionLayout.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GC createEmptyCollection()
      Creates an empty graph collection.
      GC fromCollections(Collection<G> graphHeads, Collection<V> vertices, Collection<E> edges)
      Creates a collection layout from the given collections.
      GC fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> graphHeads, org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices)
      Creates a collection from the given datasets.
      GC fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> graphHeads, org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices, org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E> edges)
      Creates a collection layout from the given datasets.
      GC fromGraph(LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> logicalGraphLayout)
      Creates a graph collection from a given logical graph.
      GC fromGraphs(LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E>... logicalGraphLayout)
      Creates a graph collection from multiple given logical graphs.
      GC fromIndexedDataSets(Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G>> graphHeads, Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V>> vertices, Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E>> edges)
      Creates a graph collection from the given datasets.
      GC fromTransactions(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> transactions)
      Creates a graph collection from a graph transaction dataset.
      GC fromTransactions(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> transactions, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<V,V> vertexMergeReducer, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<E,E> edgeMergeReducer)
      Creates a graph collection layout from graph transactions.
      GraphCollectionLayoutFactory<G,V,E> getLayoutFactory()
      Get the layout factory responsible for creating a graph collection layout.
      void setLayoutFactory(GraphCollectionLayoutFactory<G,V,E> layoutFactory)
      Sets the layout factory that is responsible for creating a graph collection layout.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.common.model.api.entities.ElementFactoryProvider

        getEdgeFactory, getGraphHeadFactory, getVertexFactory

      • fromIndexedDataSets

        GC fromIndexedDataSets(Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G>> graphHeads,
                       Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V>> vertices,
                       Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E>> edges)
        Creates a graph collection from the given datasets. The method assumes that all vertices and edges are already assigned to the specified graph heads.
        Parameters:
        graphHeads - label indexed graph head dataset
        vertices - label indexed vertex datasets
        edges - label indexed edge datasets
        Returns:
        graph collection

      • fromTransactions

        GC fromTransactions(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> transactions)
        Creates a graph collection from a graph transaction dataset. Overlapping vertices and edge are merged by Id comparison only.
        Parameters:
        transactions - transaction dataset
        Returns:
        graph collection

      • fromTransactions

        GC fromTransactions(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> transactions,
                    org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<V,V> vertexMergeReducer,
                    org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<E,E> edgeMergeReducer)
        Creates a graph collection layout from graph transactions. Overlapping vertices and edge are merged using provided reduce functions.
        Parameters:
        transactions - transaction dataset
        vertexMergeReducer - vertex merge function
        edgeMergeReducer - edge merge function
        Returns:
        graph collection

      • createEmptyCollection

        GC createEmptyCollection()
        Creates an empty graph collection.
        Returns:
        empty graph collection
